author: OrchidAlloy
description: Scans images for AI generation info and lets the user view it with a reaction or an application command.
install_msg:
ðŸ“Ž __**PromptInspector**__ ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load promptinspector
2. Add channels to scan with [p]piset channel add
3. You may add a slashtag: [p]st global message "View Parameters" {c:viewparameters {message} {hide}}```
short: Scans images for AI generation info.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
